scripts.build: cd ./shared && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./client-side && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./cpi-side && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init: cd ./shared && npm i && cd .. && cd ./client-side && npm install --force && cd .. && cd ./cpi-side && npm install && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm install && cd ..
